name: HIMACHAL PRADESH VOLUNTARY HEALTH ASSOCIATION
briefDescription: HPVHA is working with different social groups for their health, education, rights, development and implementing many projects covering all 12 districts of Himachal Pradesh. The organization is covering about 30 lakh people of the state through its different projects. The organization is implementing  projects like Handimachal, Medical Health Center, Health Care Center, Targeted Intervention Project for FSW, Migrants, Truckers, Community health, Child rights and education, disability etc.
